comment.author: 54902021@N02
comment._content:
What you see in this photograph is what I identify as follows
Me-262A-2a   JAB(2)  w (2) Bomb Racks, & (2)  250 Kg (550 Lb) Bomb  Ger WWII
Explained
A-2a & A-2a U2 Identify the AC as Bomber production
JAB (Jet Attack Bomber) w (2) signifying 2 Jet Engines
This picture is a very good likeness of the actual bomber AC and one of the better ones.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54902021@N02] Thank you very much for your great comments!
